reviewText: Monkeys are not our cousin. We come from God the Creator. Evolution is a lie.

Pretty good Documentary, with lots of scientific facts, entertaining and interesting. Nevertheless i am very surprised by the inclusion of "Dr" Susan Block "PhD" (PhD from where, from hell?) unscientific, ridiculous, unsubstantiated, laughable, nonsensical comments, that contradict  all scientific evidence presented. She seems not associated with any reputable institution, quite understandable because nobody would like to associate with a "Dr." who states, without any base, that the Bonobo "makes love not war"

I love this DVD.  I am very interested in who we, homo sapiens, really are and how we fit into all life on earth.  Having read Charles Darwin's book "On The Origin Of Species" I learned that all life is connected.  I have thought so much about that proven fact.  Then I learned about our DNA and how it backed up all of Darwin's Evolution research.  Now on this DVD "Cousin Bonobo" all this scientific research is brought together in one place--Wonderful.  How much better life for us would be if we had evolved into a female dominated society as did our cousin the Bonobo.  Sex over war I say.
very good new information for me. good info to be taught in school .
Interesting details about a wildlife species that is often misunderstood.
It is a surface examination of the species.

From apparently a television show so its not very long, it seems dated.  Most footage is of bonobos in captivity. I saw a better show on PBS several years ago that was better. I would rather have not spent the money but if your hard up for information on the amazing bonobo then go for it.
